page.title: 19WOODBROOK ROAD SHOPS
page.content: On Woodbrook Road there is a row of three terraced shops. They are{Soar {Valley Tackle,garden,hardware and pet {food supplies,Jillians (hairdressers) {and Mahers(Grocers,beers, wines and {spirits ).}Mahers has been closed for so long that the onions and potatoes have sprouted and are beginning to grow. The empty shop is next to{Model {Farm Service Station}which is also closed and overgrown. It is for sale. Behind the shops is a private car park for staff purposes only.{Trade}was bad and they had to close. Mahers looks very sad now. This shop which was once such a cheerful place is now deserted. I used to go there every day and I really miss that friendly shop. So does my mum. We hardly ever went to town for food. Now we have to{trade}at a supermarket.
